original: Hetuṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ
analyzed: hetum saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetu

original: saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ saraṇañca
analyzed: saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetum saraṇam ca

original: nahetuṁ saraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum saraṇañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ
analyzed: na hetum araṇam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetu

original: araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ araṇaṁ
analyzed: araṇam dhammam paccayā na hetu na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum araṇa

original: dhammaṁ paccayā nahetu naaraṇo ca nanahetu naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paccayā na hetu na araṇo ca na na hetu na araṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
